00051                 // if the proxy_member_caller returns non-void
00052                         template<class Ret, class Tuple>
00053                         class proxy_member_caller
00054                         {
00055 //                      friend class luabind::object;
00056                         public:
00057 
00058                                 proxy_member_caller(lua_State* L_, const Tuple args)
00059                                         : L(L_)
00060                                         , m_args(args)
00061                                         , m_called(false)
00062                                 {
00063                                 }
00064 
00065                                 proxy_member_caller(const proxy_member_caller& rhs)
00066                                         : L(rhs.L)
00067                                         , m_args(rhs.m_args)
00068                                         , m_called(rhs.m_called)
00069                                 {
00070                                         rhs.m_called = true;
00071                                 }
00072 
00073                                 ~proxy_member_caller()
00074                                 {
00075                                         if (m_called) return;
00076 
00077                                         m_called = true;
00078 
00079                                         // don't count the function and self-reference
00080                                         // since those will be popped by pcall
00081                                         int top = lua_gettop(L) - 2;
00082 
00083                                         // pcall will pop the function and self reference
00084                                         // and all the parameters
00085 
00086                                         push_args_from_tuple<1>::apply(L, m_args);
00087                                         if (pcall(L, boost::tuples::length<Tuple>::value + 1, 0))
00088                                         {
00089                                                 assert(lua_gettop(L) == top + 1);
00090 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00091                                                 throw luabind::error(L);
00092 #else
00093                                                 error_callback_fun e = get_error_callback();
00094                                                 if (e) e(L);
00095         
00096                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function threw an error and exceptions are disabled."
00097                                                                 "If you want to handle this error use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00098                                                 std::terminate();
00099 #endif
00100                                         }
00101                                         // pops the return values from the function
00102                                         stack_pop pop(L, lua_gettop(L) - top);
00103                                 }
00104 
00105                                 operator Ret()
00106                                 {
00107                                         typename mpl::apply_wrap2<default_policy,Ret,lua_to_cpp>::type converter;
00108 
00109                                         m_called = true;
00110 
00111                                         // don't count the function and self-reference
00112                                         // since those will be popped by pcall
00113                                         int top = lua_gettop(L) - 2;
00114 
00115                                         // pcall will pop the function and self reference
00116                                         // and all the parameters
00117                                         push_args_from_tuple<1>::apply(L, m_args);
00118                                         if (pcall(L, boost::tuples::length<Tuple>::value + 1, 1))
00119                                         {
00120                                                 assert(lua_gettop(L) == top + 1);
00121 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00122                                                 throw luabind::error(L); 
00123 #else
00124                                                 error_callback_fun e = get_error_callback();
00125                                                 if (e) e(L);
00126         
00127                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function threw an error and exceptions are disabled."
00128                                                         "If you want to handle this error use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00129                                                 std::terminate();
00130 #endif
00131                                         }
00132 
00133                                         // pops the return values from the function
00134                                         stack_pop pop(L, lua_gettop(L) - top);
00135 
00136 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_ERROR_CHECKING
00137 
00138                                         if (converter.match(L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(Ret), -1) < 0)
00139                                         {
00140                                                 assert(lua_gettop(L) == top + 1);
00141 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00142                                                 throw cast_failed(L, typeid(Ret));
00143 #else
00144                                                 cast_failed_callback_fun e = get_cast_failed_callback();
00145                                                 if (e) e(L, typeid(Ret));
00146 
00147                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function's return value could not be converted."
00148                                                         "If you want to handle this error use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00149                                                 std::terminate();
00150 #endif
00151                                         }
00152 #endif
00153                                         return converter.apply(L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(Ret), -1);
00154                                 }
00155 
00156                                 template<class Policies>
00157                                 Ret operator[](const Policies& p)
00158                                 {
00159                                         typedef typename find_conversion_policy<0, Policies>::type converter_policy;
00160                                         typename mpl::apply_wrap2<converter_policy,Ret,lua_to_cpp>::type converter;
00161 
00162                                         m_called = true;
00163 
00164                                         // don't count the function and self-reference
00165                                         // since those will be popped by pcall
00166                                         int top = lua_gettop(L) - 2;
00167 
00168                                         // pcall will pop the function and self reference
00169                                         // and all the parameters
00170 
00171                                         detail::push_args_from_tuple<1>::apply(L, m_args, p);
00172                                         if (pcall(L, boost::tuples::length<Tuple>::value + 1, 1))
00173                                         {
00174                                                 assert(lua_gettop(L) == top + 1);
00175 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00176                                                 throw error(L);
00177 #else
00178                                                 error_callback_fun e = get_error_callback();
00179                                                 if (e) e(L);
00180         
00181                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function threw an error and exceptions are disabled."
00182                                                         "If you want to handle this error use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00183                                                 std::terminate();
00184 #endif
00185                                         }
00186 
00187                                         // pops the return values from the function
00188                                         stack_pop pop(L, lua_gettop(L) - top);
00189 
00190 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_ERROR_CHECKING
00191 
00192                                         if (converter.match(L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(Ret), -1) < 0)
00193                                         {
00194                                                 assert(lua_gettop(L) == top + 1);
00195 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00196                                                 throw cast_failed(L, typeid(Ret));
00197 #else
00198                                                 cast_failed_callback_fun e = get_cast_failed_callback();
00199                                                 if (e) e(L, typeid(Ret));
00200 
00201                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function's return value could not be converted."
00202                                                         "If you want to handle this error use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00203                                                 std::terminate();
00204 #endif
00205                                         }
00206 #endif
00207                                         return converter.apply(L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(Ret), -1);
00208                                 }
00209 
00210                         private:
00211 
00212                                 lua_State* L;
00213                                 Tuple m_args;
00214                                 mutable bool m_called;
00215 
00216                         };

00218                 // if the proxy_member_caller returns void
00219                         template<class Tuple>
00220                         class proxy_member_void_caller
00221                         {
00222                         friend class luabind::object;
00223                         public:
00224 
00225                                 proxy_member_void_caller(lua_State* L_, const Tuple args)
00226                                         : L(L_)
00227                                         , m_args(args)
00228                                         , m_called(false)
00229                                 {
00230                                 }
00231 
00232                                 proxy_member_void_caller(const proxy_member_void_caller& rhs)
00233                                         : L(rhs.L)
00234                                         , m_args(rhs.m_args)
00235                                         , m_called(rhs.m_called)
00236                                 {
00237                                         rhs.m_called = true;
00238                                 }
00239 
00240                                 ~proxy_member_void_caller()
00241                                 {
00242                                         if (m_called) return;
00243 
00244                                         m_called = true;
00245 
00246                                         // don't count the function and self-reference
00247                                         // since those will be popped by pcall
00248                                         int top = lua_gettop(L) - 2;
00249 
00250                                         // pcall will pop the function and self reference
00251                                         // and all the parameters
00252 
00253                                         push_args_from_tuple<1>::apply(L, m_args);
00254                                         if (pcall(L, boost::tuples::length<Tuple>::value + 1, 0))
00255                                         {
00256                                                 assert(lua_gettop(L) == top + 1);
00257 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00258                                                 throw luabind::error(L);
00259 #else
00260                                                 error_callback_fun e = get_error_callback();
00261                                                 if (e) e(L);
00262         
00263                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function threw an error and exceptions are disabled."
00264                                                         "If you want to handle this error use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00265                                                 std::terminate();
00266 #endif
00267                                         }
00268                                         // pops the return values from the function
00269                                         stack_pop pop(L, lua_gettop(L) - top);
00270                                 }
00271 
00272                                 template<class Policies>
00273                                 void operator[](const Policies& p)
00274                                 {
00275                                         m_called = true;
00276 
00277                                         // don't count the function and self-reference
00278                                         // since those will be popped by pcall
00279                                         int top = lua_gettop(L) - 2;
00280 
00281                                         // pcall will pop the function and self reference
00282                                         // and all the parameters
00283 
00284                                         detail::push_args_from_tuple<1>::apply(L, m_args, p);
00285                                         if (pcall(L, boost::tuples::length<Tuple>::value + 1, 0))
00286                                         {
00287                                                 assert(lua_gettop(L) == top + 1);
00288 #ifndef LUABIND_NO_EXCEPTIONS
00289                                                 throw error(L);
00290 #else
00291                                                 error_callback_fun e = get_error_callback();
00292                                                 if (e) e(L);
00293         
00294                                                 assert(0 && "the lua function threw an error and exceptions are disabled."
00295                                                         "If you want to handle this error use luabind::set_error_callback()");
00296                                                 std::terminate();
00297 #endif
00298                                         }
00299                                         // pops the return values from the function
00300                                         stack_pop pop(L, lua_gettop(L) - top);
00301                                 }
00302 
00303                         private:
00304                                 lua_State* L;
00305                                 Tuple m_args;
00306                                 mutable bool m_called;

00312         #define BOOST_PP_ITERATION_PARAMS_1 (4, (0, LUABIND_MAX_ARITY, <luabind/detail/call_member.hpp>, 1))
00313         #include BOOST_PP_ITERATE()

00318 
00319 #elif BOOST_PP_ITERATION_FLAGS() == 1
00320 
00321 #define LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS(z, n, data) const A##n *
00322 #define LUABIND_OPERATOR_PARAMS(z, n, data) const A##n & a##n
00323 
00324         template<class R BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(BOOST_PP_ITERATION()) BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), class A)>
00325         typename boost::mpl::if_<boost::is_void<R>
00326                         , luabind::detail::proxy_member_void_caller<boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> >
00327                         , luabind::detail::proxy_member_caller<R, boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> > >::type
00328         call_member(object const& obj, const char* name BOOST_PP_COMMA_IF(BOOST_PP_ITERATION()) BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_OPERATOR_PARAMS, _))
00329         {
00330                 typedef boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> tuple_t;
00331 #if BOOST_PP_ITERATION() == 0
00332                 tuple_t args;
00333 #else
00334                 tuple_t args(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), &a));
00335 #endif
00336 
00337                 typedef typename boost::mpl::if_<boost::is_void<R>
00338                         , luabind::detail::proxy_member_void_caller<boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> >
00339                         , luabind::detail::proxy_member_caller<R, boost::tuples::tuple<BOOST_PP_ENUM(BOOST_PP_ITERATION(), LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS, _)> > >::type proxy_type;
00340 
00341                 // this will be cleaned up by the proxy object
00342                 // once the call has been made
00343 
00344                 // get the function
00345                 obj.push(obj.interpreter());
00346                 lua_pushstring(obj.interpreter(), name);
00347                 lua_gettable(obj.interpreter(), -2);
00348                 // duplicate the self-object
00349                 lua_pushvalue(obj.interpreter(), -2);
00350                 // remove the bottom self-object
00351                 lua_remove(obj.interpreter(), -3);
00352 
00353                 // now the function and self objects
00354                 // are on the stack. These will both
00355                 // be popped by pcall
00356                 return proxy_type(obj.interpreter(), args);
00357         }
00358 
00359 #undef LUABIND_OPERATOR_PARAMS
00360 #undef LUABIND_TUPLE_PARAMS
00361 
00362 #endif
